summary: This is Part 1 of a mod i am making where you go to a desert island after being contacted by a powerful friend.
descriptionHtml:
this is Part 1 of a mod i am making where you go to a desert island after being contacted by a powerful friend. a great evil is rising in a distant land far from Tamriel a mysterious wizard has contacted you and leads you on a fantastic adventure in unique locations you will face hordes of unholy beast .Use your brain to figure out riddles to find keys that are hidden on the map

you can find the first note in breeze home it might be on the floor when you enter look to the left. to enter the island there is small metal cage door on the middle pole on the long boat.

plese make sure you get all the hints they are all near the entrance of locations
but there are a few without them

the exit back to skyrim from lostcity it the wheel on is the big boat at the dock

you might need to download moonpath to elsweyr

included:
exotic locations
town
holy weapons
unique bosses
riddles

i have already started part 2 i will post pictures soon

next update:
better town
quests
jail
imperial style city
more locations

there is a few bugs i will fix soon


thank you to muppetpuppet for letting me use his assets
plz check out muppetpuppets mod moonpath to elsweyr

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9782 

this is my second mod so criticism is welcome
author: willymc
